mapper.select: /* snipBoard.getDetail */ SELECT SB.UID AS BOARD_UID ,SB.BBS_UID ,SB.TITLE ,SB.CONTENT ,SB.DELETE_AT ,SB.REG_UID ,SB.REG_DT ,SU_REG.USER_ID AS REG_ID ,SB.UPDT_UID ,SB.UPDT_DT ,SU_UPDT.USER_ID AS UPDT_ID FROM SNP_BOARD SB LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_REG ON SU_REG.UID = SB.REG_UID LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_UPDT ON SU_UPDT.UID = SB.UPDT_UID WHERE UID = #{uid}
